name: Climate Change - Innovation Concept
description:
My Climate Change project is a concept that could be used in other games such as Grand Theft Autos mission system. The point of the project is to innovate learning through gameplay mechanics and the learning objective here is all about climate change.

Players can play the Cycle Runner gamemode and avoid obstacles (gameplay) while being advocated to change their mode of transport. This project shouldn't be classed as complete, but more of the start of something bigger.
